Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Deep goblet with a rounded conical base, slightly restricted mouth and simple lip. The inside surface, which is light brown with large black patches due to fire clouding, was horizontally burnished. The outside surface, whose border is black, bears traces of a red slip that has mostly disappeared. It has been vertically burnished, though the gloss has faded a lot.
